label.twitterUsernameDescription: Will be kept private, only used for communication purposes

alert.browserError: Unfortunately, IE and Edge browsers are not supported at this time. Please use another browser.
alert.suspensionNotice: Currently, all the bots have been suspended. I do not know the reason for the suspensions, but I have contacted Twitter support. Please wait a little bit.

guide.line1: Accepted file types: .jpg .png .mp4. 10MB file size limit.
guide.line2: Images will be manually reviewed within 24 hours of uploading.
guide.line3: Do not submit another person's pictures without their permission.
guide.line4: Do not submit low resolution or edited images.
guide.line5: If possible, avoid including subtitles or dialogue boxes in the image.
guide.line6: With the exception of the Futami twins, group pictures will not be accepted.
guide.line7: Low quality images will be rejected (Example: face is obscured, bad screenshot angle)
